D

dateFormatter() - Static method in class com.k2.Util.DateUtil
This method returns the current date formatter Defaults to "yyyy-MM-dd"
dateFormatter(SimpleDateFormat) - Static method in class com.k2.Util.DateUtil
This method set the current date formatter to the given formatter This formatter will be used if the utility is defined to format dates into date only format
dateFormatter(DateUtil.DateFormat) - Static method in class com.k2.Util.DateUtil
This method returns the current data formatter for the given date format
dateTimeFormatter() - Static method in class com.k2.Util.DateUtil
This method returns the current date time formatter Defaults to "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:SS"
dateTimeFormatter(SimpleDateFormat) - Static method in class com.k2.Util.DateUtil
This method set the current date time formatter to the given formatter This formatter will be used if the utility is defined to format date into date time format
DateUtil - Class in com.k2.Util
This utility provides static method for handling Date values.
DateUtil() - Constructor for class com.k2.Util.DateUtil
 
DateUtil.DateFormat - Enum in com.k2.Util
This enumeration identifies the default data formatter
defaultDateFormatter() - Static method in class com.k2.Util.DateUtil
This method returns the current default date formatter according to the default date format
defaultDateFormatter(DateUtil.DateFormat) - Static method in class com.k2.Util.DateUtil
This method defines whethe the default date format should be date only or date and time Defaults to date and time
deleteCascade(File) - Static method in class com.k2.Util.FileUtil
This method deletes the given file and if it is a directory recursively deletes all its contents
DoubleUtil - Class in com.k2.Util
This utility provides static method for handling Double values.
DoubleUtil() - Constructor for class com.k2.Util.DoubleUtil
